settings.p:
At Kush Queen, our CBD stands out with a full-spectrum hemp extract that’s engineered for unmatched quality and consistency. Made in the USA, our proprietary "KQ Spec" formulation ensures a perfectly balanced cannabinoid ratio in every gummy. This means you’ll get the same reliable, high-quality experience with every dose, making our gummies ideal for both daily use and targeted wellness.

Our CBD gummies are available in three targeted ratio effects: Sleep, Focus and Bliss. Each blend pairs CBD with a minor cannabinoids so you can choose the effect that fits your needs—whether you’re looking for a mild calming effect, a before bed gummy, or a dose with help with energy and focus. We also feature a variety of flavors, such as strawberry, blue raspberry, and pink lemonade.

From relaxation to pain relief, our gummies are designed to elevate your wellness routine, helping you feel great every single time.

Meet your go-to for daily calm and total wellness. Each vegan gummy is infused with 25mg of full-spectrum CBD, capturing the full range of cannabinoids and terpenes to bring you the complete benefits of the hemp plant. Artfully handcrafted in small batches, these gummies are as delicious as they are effective, with a burst of sweet, tart strawberry flavor. Whether you need to unwind after a long day or ease inflammation, these gummies are here to help.

settings.h3: Pairing CBN & CBD for the Best Night’s Sleep

settings.p: Our CBN Sleep Gummies are vegan and formulated to ease body tension while promoting peaceful sleep. Each gummy contains a 1:1 ratio of CBD and CBN, delivering 15mg of CBN and 15mg of CBD per serving. Made with single-source full-spectrum hemp extract, these gummies harness the sedative effects of CBN, a minor cannabinoid known for supporting better rest. As one satisfied customer shares, "After a lifetime of trouble getting to sleep, I can finally rest better with the help of Kush Queen's Sleep Gummies.

settings.h3: Boost Your Mood with the Perfect Combo of CBG & CBD

settings.p: Discover your daily dose of happiness with our Bliss CBG Gummies. Packed with a 1:1 blend of 15mg CBG and 15mg CBD, these gummies are the perfect pick-me-up for when you need an uplifting mood boost. Designed to melt stress away and energize your outlook, each gummy bursts with vibrant raspberry flavors, delivering a sweet moment of bliss. Whether you’re looking to brighten your day or find calm in the everyday hustle, Bliss CBG Gummies are your delicious path to balance and clarity.

Unlock your focus and elevate your energy with our THCv Gummies - Focus & Energize. Crafted with a 7:1 blend of CBD and delta-9  -derived THCV, these gummies are your secret weapon for powering through your day. Whether you need a productivity boost or want to curb your appetite, these vegan, sweet, and tangy gummies have got you covered. With each bite, enjoy smooth, steady energy that helps you stay sharp and focused without the jitters. It’s time to embrace your flow state and get things done

settings.question: Are there any side effects from taking CBD gummies?
settings.answer: Side effects from CBD are rare, but in high doses, some people may experience dry mouth, drowsiness, reduced appetite, or diarrhea. CBD can also interact with certain prescription medications, so it's important to consult your doctor if you're on medication before starting a CBD regimen.

settings.question: What are CBD gummies good for?
settings.answer: CBD gummies are great for promoting relaxation, managing stress and anxiety, easing pain, and supporting overall wellness. They offer a convenient, tasty way to consume CBD and are especially popular among those looking for non-psychoactive, natural relief from everyday ailments.

settings.question: Will CBD gummies make me high?
settings.answer: No, CBD gummies made with hemp-derived CBD will not make you high, as they contain less than 0.3% THC, which is not enough to cause psychoactive effects. However, if you’re using full-spectrum CBD gummies, trace amounts of THC may still be present.

settings.question: What happens when you take CBD for the first time?
settings.answer: When you take CBD for the first time, you may experience a mild sense of calm and relaxation as CBD interacts with your body's endocannabinoid system. Start with a low dose to gauge how your body responds and increase gradually as needed.

settings.question: How long do CBD gummies last?
settings.answer: The effects of CBD gummies can last anywhere from 6 to 8 hours, depending on your body’s metabolism, weight, and other factors. However, because they need to pass through the digestive system, it can take 30 minutes to 2 hours for the effects to kick in.

settings.question: Will full spectrum CBD make me fail a drug test?
settings.answer: Yes, using full-spectrum CBD could potentially cause you to fail a drug test. Full-spectrum CBD products contain trace amounts of THC (usually less than 0.3%), which is the psychoactive compound in cannabis that drug tests are designed to detect. While the amount of THC in these products is minimal, consistent use could result in a buildup of THC in your system, making it possible for a drug test to return a positive result for THC.

settings.question: Can you take CBD gummies for sleep?
settings.answer: Yes, CBD is known for its calming properties, and our CBD sleep gummies, which include CBN, are formulated specifically to help promote a restful night’s sleep.

settings.question: CBD gummies vs CBD oil tinctures: What's the difference?
settings.answer: CBD gummies are edibles that pass through your digestive system, taking longer to absorb (30 minutes to 2 hours), but their effects last 6 to 8 hours. CBD oil tinctures are absorbed sublingually (under the tongue) for faster effects (15 to 30 minutes), but the effects last around 2 to 6 hours.

settings.question: Are CBD gummies legal in my state?
settings.answer: CBD gummies derived from hemp (containing less than 0.3% THC) are federally legal under the 2018 Farm Bill. However, each state has different regulations regarding CBD. While most states allow the sale and use of CBD products, a few have restrictions. Always check your state’s specific laws regarding CBD to ensure compliance.
